stimulusHtml: Find the radius of the sphere as a function of t.

features.html: At time t,t ≥0 , the volume of a sphere is increasing at a rate proportional to the reciprocal of its radius. At t =0 , the radius of the sphere is 1 and at t =15 , the radius is 2. (The volume V of a sphere with a radius r is V=4/3πr3 .)
